body:
You need to vary this based on `__cplusplus` as well. Something like:

```
#ifdef __cplusplus
#define THStorage at::Storage
#else
typedef struct at_Storage at_Storage;
#define THStorage at_Storage
#endif
```
body_html:
You need to vary this based on __cplusplus as well. Something like:

#ifdef __cplusplus
#define THStorage at::Storage
#else
typedef struct at_Storage at_Storage;
#define THStorage at_Storage
#endif
